list.title: addPlayer
list.description: Adds a player to a score board.

list.title: applyMondayBonus
list.description: Applies 100 bonus points to all players on the board.

list.title: createScoreBoard
list.description: Creates a new score board with an initial entry.

list.title: normalizeScore
list.description: Normalizes a score with the provided normalization function.

list.title: removePlayer
list.description: Removes a player from a score board.

list.title: updateScore
list.description: Increases a player's score by the given amount.
